entry.title: Garden at Adachi Museum・足立美術館の庭園

link.title: Garden at Adachi Museum・足立美術館の庭園

entry.content:
Rated the most beautiful garden in Japan, the garden at the Adachi Museum of Art in Tottori Prefecture is worthy of that distinction.

This modern garden is part of the Adachi Museum, a collection of late 19th and 20th century Japanese art.
